serviceName: HM Land Registry Application to change the register

pages.question_text: What is the local authority serving the property?
pages.hint_text: Where there is more than one local authority serving an area, enter the one to which council tax or business rates are normally paid.

pages.question_text: What is the full postcode of the property?
pages.hint_text: Enter the full postcode if available.

pages.question_text: What are the title numbers of the property?
pages.hint_text: Enter the title number of each title that requires an entry to be made in that register.

pages.question_text: Does the application affect the whole of the title or part of it?

options.text: Part of the title(s) as shown

pages.question_text: Describe the part of the title affected
pages.hint_text: Give a brief description of the part affected, for example 'edged red on the plan to the transfer dated...'

pages.question_text: What applications are you making in priority order?
pages.hint_text: List the applications in the order of priority you want them processed.

pages.question_text: What is the price paid or value?
pages.hint_text: Enter the amount in pounds (£).

pages.question_text: What fees are you paying?
pages.hint_text: Enter the fee amount in pounds (£).

pages.question_text: How will you pay the fees?

options.text: Direct debit, under an agreement with Land Registry

pages.question_text: What documents are you lodging with this form?
pages.hint_text: List all documents you are sending with this application.

pages.question_text: What is the full name of the person or organisation applying?
pages.hint_text: Provide the full name(s) of the person(s) applying to change the register.

pages.question_text: Is the applicant a UK company or limited liability partnership?
What is the registered number of the company or limited liability partnership?
pages.hint_text: Include any prefix with the number.

pages.question_text: Is the applicant an overseas entity?
What is the territory of incorporation or formation?
What is the overseas entity ID issued by Companies House?
pages.hint_text: Include any prefix with the ID. If not required, state 'not required'.

pages.question_text: What is the UK registered number issued by Companies House?
pages.hint_text: Only complete if the entity has a place of business in the United Kingdom. Include any prefix.

pages.question_text: What is your key number?
pages.hint_text: Only available to professional customers such as solicitors. Leave blank if not applicable.

pages.question_text: What is the name of the person or organisation sending this application?
What is your address or UK DX box number?
What is your email address?
What is your reference?
What is your phone number?
What is your fax number?
pages.hint_text: Leave blank if not applicable.

pages.question_text: Do you want to notify a third party about this application?
What is the name of the third party to notify?
What is the third party's address or UK DX box number?
What is the third party's email address?
What is the third party's reference?
What address for service should be used for each proprietor?
pages.hint_text: Each proprietor may give up to three addresses for service, one of which must be a postal address.

options.text: The address of the property (where this is a single postal address)
The address(es) for service from the transfer/assent
The current address(es) for service in the register

pages.question_text: What are the following addresses for service?
pages.hint_text: Provide the specific addresses for service.

pages.question_text: Is there a new charge to be entered in the register?
What is the name and address for service of the proprietor of the new charge?
Is the charge proprietor a UK company or limited liability partnership?
What is the registered number of the company or limited liability partnership?
pages.hint_text: Include any prefix with the number.

pages.question_text: Is the charge proprietor an overseas company?
What is the territory of incorporation?
What is the UK registered number issued by Companies House?
pages.hint_text: Only complete if the company has a place of business in the United Kingdom. Include any prefix.

pages.question_text: Does this application relate to a registrable disposition with disclosable overriding interests?
pages.hint_text: Tick if this application relates to a registrable disposition and disclosable overriding interests affect the registered estate.

pages.question_text: Are you a conveyancer?
pages.hint_text: A conveyancer includes solicitors and licensed conveyancers authorised to provide reserved legal services relating to land registration.

pages.question_text: What are the details of parties to the disposition?
pages.hint_text: For each party to each disposition that is to be registered, provide the name and conveyancer details.

pages.question_text: Are you satisfied that sufficient steps have been taken to verify identity?
pages.hint_text: Confirm for any unrepresented parties that you are satisfied about identity verification.

pages.question_text: Are you enclosing evidence of identity?
pages.hint_text: Confirm if you are enclosing evidence of identity for unrepresented parties.
